questions.question_text: Organizations using multiple public and private cloud platforms can deploy and configure the VM-Series using which three toolsets? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABD
A, B, ad D are correct. On pan.dev look at the "partner integrations" and "automation". They list Terraform and Ansible. The third choice, "Panorama", is obvious.
https://pan.dev/ansible/
https://pan.dev/terraform/

A
"Performance" and "Most end users complain of being unable to access the internet". can be explained by the fact that the maximum number of sessions is limited if the firewall is not licensed. other answers do not make sense.

questions.question_text:
A data center experiences a power outage that results in the reboot of all ESXi servers, including the software firewall's virtual machine (VM). Subsequently, there is a notable decrease in performance. Most end users complain of being unable to access the internet. The system engineer is still able to log in to the firewall management console smoothly.

What is most likely causing this issue?

choices.D: The last saved configuration did not save properly in the boot up partition.
choices.B: The dataplane disk partitions are unable to mount after the reboot.
choices.C: There is configuration file corruption on ESXi server.
